cofh.lib.util.helpers

Class FireworksHelper.Explosion

  • java.lang.Object
    • cofh.lib.util.helpers.FireworksHelper.Explosion
  • Enclosing class:
    FireworksHelper

    public static final class FireworksHelper.Explosion
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single explosion that a firework rocket can contain.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  FireworksHelper.Explosion.Type
      The different shapes that an explosion can have.

      • getRandom

        public static FireworksHelper.Explosion getRandom(int primaryColors,
                                  int fadeColors)
        Generates a randomized Explosion instance.
        Parameters:
        primaryColors - The amount of different primary colors that the Explosion will have.
        fadeColors - The amount of different fade colors that the Explosion will have.
        Returns:
        A random Explosion instance

      • setTwinkle

        public FireworksHelper.Explosion setTwinkle(boolean twinkle)
        Sets whether the explosion should have the 'twinkle' effect (made with Glowstone Dust).
        Parameters:
        twinkle - Whether to have the 'twinkle' effect.
        Returns:
        The current Explosion instance.

                                        int green,
                                        int blue)
        Adds a primary color to the explosion.
        Parameters:
        red - The RGB red value of the color to add (0 - 255).
        green - The RGB green value of the color to add (0 - 255).
        blue - The RGB blue value of the color to add (0 - 255).
        Returns:
        The current Explosion instance.
